title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 150.9 - Local certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 150.9 - Local certification

State Regulations

The provisions of sections
150.6, 150.7 and
150.8
of this Part shall not apply
in the event of and for the duration of a valid certification to the Federal

Highway Administration by the State in accordance with the terms of the
agreement between the Commissioner of Transportation and the Secretary of

Transportation of the United States, dated May 13, 1968. The regulations which
have been promulgated for such areas with respect to size of signs, spacing of
signs and lighting in commercial and industrial zones shall control. For the
purposes of this section, requirements as to the number of signs permitted on a
single plot or parcel of land will be considered to be a spacing
requirement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
150.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
